39 // Class Island
44 class Island {
45 
46  private:
47 
48  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
49 
51  RigidBody** mBodies;
52

55 
57  Joint** mJoints;
58

61 
63  uint mNbContactManifolds;
64 
66  uint mNbJoints;
67 
68  public:
69 
70  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //

73  Island(uint nbMaxBodies, uint nbMaxContactManifolds, uint nbMaxJoints,
74  MemoryManager& memoryManager);
75 
77  ~Island();

115 };
116 
117 // Add a body into the island
118 inline void Island::addBody(RigidBody* body) {
119  assert(!body->isSleeping());
120  mBodies[mNbBodies] = body;
121  mNbBodies++;
122 }
123 
124 // Add a contact manifold into the island
125 inline void Island::addContactManifold(ContactManifold* contactManifold) {
126  mContactManifolds[mNbContactManifolds] = contactManifold;
127  mNbContactManifolds++;
128 }
129 
130 // Add a joint into the island
131 inline void Island::addJoint(Joint* joint) {
132  mJoints[mNbJoints] = joint;
133  mNbJoints++;
134 }
135 
136 // Return the number of bodies in the island
137 inline uint Island::getNbBodies() const {
138  return mNbBodies;
139 }
140 
141 // Return the number of contact manifolds in the island
142 inline uint Island::getNbContactManifolds() const {
143  return mNbContactManifolds;
144 }
145 
146 // Return the number of joints in the island
147 inline uint Island::getNbJoints() const {
148  return mNbJoints;
149 }
150 
151 // Return a pointer to the array of bodies
152 inline RigidBody** Island::getBodies() {
153  return mBodies;
154 }
155 
156 // Return a pointer to the array of contact manifolds
157 inline ContactManifold** Island::getContactManifolds() {
158  return mContactManifolds;
159 }
160 
161 // Return a pointer to the array of joints
162 inline Joint** Island::getJoints() {
163  return mJoints;
164 }
165 
166 }
